title: Map of Population Density of Africa - support data

content.question: Which statement is best supported by the data shown on the map?

choices.label: There are no large cities in North Africa.
The population of Addis Ababa is over 1,000,000.
Southeast Africa is the most densely populated region on the continent.
There are no densely populated areas along the coast of the Gulf of Guinea.

content.answer: The population of Addis Ababa is over 1,000,000.

topic.text: 1.2: The African Continent: A Varied Landscape

skill.text: 2.D: Describe and draw conclusions from patterns, trends, and limitations in data, making connections to relevant course content.
